parameters.name: validate_only
parameters.description: The identifier to indicate if it is set to only validate or not.

override_acceptId.description: pass the record Id to accept all its overrides

accountWithBankDisplayName.description: It Specifies the beneficiary's full name

accountWithBankStreets.description: It specifies the street for the beneficiary

accountWithBankCities.description: It specifies the town or city beneficiary belongs

accountWithBankCity.description: It specifies the town or city beneficiary belongs

paymentDetails.description: Identifies the Payment Details to enable the Beneficiary to apply the payment.

ultimateCreditorAddressLine.description: It specifies the address fields to be used for the Ultimate creditor of payment

owningCustomerId.description: The identifier of the owning customer

beneficiaryAccountId.description: The identifier of the beneficiary account

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: The customer identifier where the beneficiary is a customer of the bank

bankSortCode.description: Defines the bank sorting code of the bank and branch. The code entered must exist as a sort code. 6 numeric characters.

beneficiaryIBAN.description: The IBAN of the beneficiary's account

beneficiaryBIC.description: BIC (Bank Identifier Code) of the beneficiary customer

beneficiaryBICCity.description: The city of the beneficiary BIC

accountWithBank.description: Identifies the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

accountWithBankIBAN.description: IBAN of Account with Bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

accountWithBankClearingCode.description: Clearing code or sort code of the account with bank being the bank where the beneficiary maintains his account.

beneficiaryOtherIdType.description: It specifies the type of beneficiary like private or beneficiary

beneficiaryDOB.description: It provides Date of Birth of the beneficiary

beneficiaryBirthProvince.description: It indicates the place of birth

beneficiaryBirthCity.description: It indicates the city of birth for the beneficiary

beneficiaryBirthCountry.description: It denotes the country of birth

customerReference.description: The reference quoted by customer of the ordering account in a payment that is to be communicated to the beneficiary when a payment takes place

paymentOrderPurposeCodeId.description: The identifier of the payment order purpose code

paymentCategory.description: A catgorisation code for a payment request

preferredPaymentProduct.description: The preferred payment order product which allows payment through the beneficiary

preferredPaymentAmount.description: The payment amount to be populated in the FT (Fund Transfer) or Payment Order when the Beneficiary will be used is displayed in this field

paymentCurrency.description: Holds the list of currencies for which the payment order will be accepted for the country and payment order with any currencies other than one defined will not be allowed.When left undefined then payment order will be open for all currencies

beneficiaryOurCharges.description: Determines who will be responsible for charges.

ultimateCreditorDisplayName.description: It specifies the name of the ultimate creditor of the payment

ultimateCreditorAddressType.description: It specifies the address type to be used for the Ultimate creditor of payment

ultimateCreditorBIC.description: It specifies the BIC code of Ultimate creditor of payment

ultimateCreditorCountry.description: It specifies the Country of Ultimate creditor of payment

ultimateCreditorOtherIdType.description: It specifies the type of ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorDOB.description: It indicates the Date Of Birth of ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorBirthProvince.description: It indicates the place of birth for creditor

ultimateCreditorBirthCity.description: It indicates the birth city of ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorBirthCountry.description: It indicates the country of birth for the creditor

ultimateCreditorSchemeProprietary.description: Scheme proprietaries of the ultimate creditor

ultimateCreditorSchemeIssuer.description: Scheme Issuer of the ultimate creditor
